author: dreid
msg: Next pass at moving to using pmc files rather than the rather nasty hacks we had
in place up till now. I think I've gotten most of the places that this change
need to be made, but no doubt I'll have missed one or two.
Lots of small changes to better support page production as well.
Introduction of the first xsl file for the xdocs directory! It works with
the latest version of xdocs2 and seems to work quite well :-)
Not sure what the next step is to get this onto the live site. Also to remove
some of the problems we really need to alter the project files - but we
can discuss doing that sometime soon.
One more change to come that should show the power of the xsl method a bit
